body.paragraph: Can only be used inside a f''. Allows inserting any value (number, text, variable, list, ...) as part of the text by simply using { } inside a f''.

body.example:
age = 16
name = "Alex"
print(f'My name is {name} and I am {age} years old')

tooltip.title: Formatted Text Item
tooltip.body: Converts the item to its textual value. Can only be used inside a formatted text (f'').
